name: Minotrace
overview: Race against the clock to escape from the convoluted dungeons of the rainbow zebra. This little snack game was build to showcase a grid based ray-casting routine written with the Oscar C compiler. Eight different labyrinth creating routines provide 27 levels of increasing size and complexity. Use the joystick direction control to navigate, and the button to accelerate. A preview of the maze is shown before each race and can be inspected using the left and right joystick control. The STOP button opens a small in game menu.
